name: Mono Tone Prototype/Demo!
description:
This is a game called Mono Tone. A music game where you can listen to music, hit those beats, and jump over the note themsleves!

This is just a prototype/demo, and i would like your feedback and maybe tips

with what the pricing should be.

im think around ~~15 to 24 dollars when the game is complete.

the hub music "Effect stones" is on nature sounds - 101 soundboardsounds .com

extract files with right click after downloading.
